thread.title: Perfect location, very nice and welcoming staff
thread.title_full: Perfect location, very nice and welcoming staff - Review of Grand Hotel du Palais Royal, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: A2393URannas
title: Perfect location, very nice and welcoming staff
text: We stayed here for one night during a small trip to Paris and had a great experience. The staff was very nice and welcoming. The room was confortable and we had a beautiful view from our little balcony! Very nice bathroom with walk-in shower.
